description: Tag 35861 - Acacia - Crown reduce height and width by 2-3 meters leaving a canopy spread of 9meters in height and 7-8meters in width. Deadwood. Tree located close to path, trying to conserve the treeTag 35701 - Pear -Crown reduce height and width by 1-2 meters leaving a crown spread of 7 meters in height and 6 meters in width.Tag 35862 - Multi-stemmed Sycamore - Fell and grind. Tag 35863 - Prunus - Lift by 1-2 meters building side only leaving a remaining crown spread of 6 meters in height and widthTag 35872 - Corsican Pine - Cut back one branch by 1-2 meters to clear lamp column, leaving a canopy spread of 16 meters in height and 12 meters in width. Deadwood.Tag 35874 - Group x 16 Corsican Pine - 2-3 meter reduction of lateral branches and some of the crown, no height reduction. Leaving a canopy spread of 16 meters in height and 12 meters in widthPhoto no 22 - Lime -Remove some crossing branches, thin tree by 10% and climb to inspect. Deadwood. Leaving a canopy spread of 14 meters in width and 18 meters in height.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
